articles.content: Apple's shares fell 1.8% on Friday, ending the trading session at $149.80 apiece. The company’s market capitalization dropped to $2.48 trillion. Microsoft shares, however, showed 2.2% gains, reaching… [+1954 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Short
articles.title: Will the person who attacked an American Airlines flight attendant be charged? - FOX 31 Denver
articles.description: The American Airlines flight attendant attacked by a passenger mid-flight is back home after a short stay at a Denver hospital, but the person who attacked her has not been charged.
articles.content:
DENVER (KDVR) The American Airlines flight attendant attacked by a passenger mid-flight is back home after a short stay at a Denver hospital.

articles.title: ‘Revenge Travel’ Could Boost the Cruise Lines. What It Means for the Stocks. - Barron's
articles.description: The tide is turning back in favor of cruise lines that successfully weathered Covid-19. Royal Caribbean is betting vacationers will make up for lost time with a nine-month Ultimate World Cruise.
